tests.expected: User should be redirected to the home page.

tests.instruction: Press on the request tag button.
Press on the request tag button. Fill in at least the tag name, and press submit.
tests.expected: Request should be submitted, viewable in the admin page. The request tag window should close, and a pop up message appears notifying the user.
User should be redirected to their own profile page.
User should be redirected to their message page, and private chats appear by default.
User should be redirected to the settings page.

tests.instruction: Log in with an admin account. (Note: apply for admin if you want to test this. If you don't know how, you have not read our README carefully)
tests.expected: User should be redirected to the admin page.

tests.instruction: Input some text into the search bar. Hit enter or press search.
tests.expected: All users with username that has search parameter as substring appears in the result list.

On navigation bar, number of unread chats under chat icon must be correct, and total number of unresponded incoming friend requests and number of new outgoing accepted friend requests must be correct.

tests.instruction: Click on notification (bell) icon, open incoming friend requests
tests.expected: All incoming friend requests are displayed, with action buttons accept and reject.

tests.instruction: Click on notification (bell) icon, open incoming friend requests, press on accept friend request.
tests.expected: Friend request is accepted, friendship is created. Redirect to the user's profile page to verify.

tests.instruction: Click on notification (bell) icon, open incoming friend requests, press on reject friend request.
tests.expected: Friend request is deleted, friendship is not created. Redirect to the user's profile page to verify.

tests.instruction: Click on notification (bell) icon, open outgoing friend requests.
tests.expected: Notifications on new accepted outgoing friend requests (since last redirect) is displayed.

tests.instruction: Click on notification (bell) icon. Close the browser (the entire window, not just the tab) and immediately open the page.
tests.expected: If no friend request is sent to you in that split second, accepted outgoing friend requests tab is empty.
